thread.title: Something should be improved - Review
thread.title_full: Something should be improved - Review of Hotel 7 Eiffel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: noa49
title: Something should be improved - Review
text:
This has been our 3rd time at this hotel along some years. It always was our place of choice to stay while in Paris
The location is excellent - a silent street at the 7th quarter - between the Invalides and the the Eiffel. Walking distance to major attractions. 3 minutes walk to to the Metro.
The room was clean and cousy as usual, excellent breakfast, warm and friendly staff at the reception.
But - the elevator was out of order for all the week we have stayed (I suspect it was not working for a few days even before) - although many explanations, and excuses were given ...; the Venta (ventilator) in the toilette was not working and was not repaired for all the week although we have reported time and again... shortage in soap supply.... What is going there in this nice hotel that we loved to visit?
Room Tip: Be sure the elevator is working.... See more room tips
